sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Intel ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.1%.
Year to date, Intel has lost about 5.2% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 1.0%.
Procter & Gamble is lower by about 13.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Boeing ( BA ), trading down 0.9%, and McDonald's ( MCD ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
